PrecisOrder (a) appointing ROYAL BANK OF CANADA as Fiscal Agent and Registrar in connection with the sale of Securities (U.S. Dollars) issued pursuant to Orders in Council P.C. 1997-437 and P.C. 1997-1368, and (b) designating who may sign or countersign the securities for the Deputy Minister of Finance.
